author: ET Online
title: India's first at-home Covid testing kit launched
description: India's first at-home Covid testing kit launchedThe easy-to-use kit, approved by the Indian Council of Medical Research, displays accurate results within minutes.
content:
With the world putting forward all measures to fight the coronavirus pandemic, genetic and microbiome testing firm Bione, on Thursday, launched India's first Rapid Covid-19 at-home screening test kit.
Experts around the world have emphasised on the need for … [+5379 chars]
